Verification of In-Home Attendant Fees Required
The claimant is required to submit verification of attendant fees when
monthly in-home attendant fees are $5,000 or more, or
the claimed expenses are questionable as defined in
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.G.5.a
.
